articles.description: New evidence released Tuesday documented so-called nodules in the eyes of patients battling severe COVID-19, with scientists hypothesizing causes like virus-related inflammation and positioning patients face down to improve oxygenation.

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: COVID-19 Variant That Originated In South Africa Found In Mass. - WBUR
articles.description: The variant was discovered in a female in her 20s who lives in Middlesex County and who had no reported travel.
articles.content:
The first case of the COVID-19 variant believed to have originated in South Africa has been identified in Massachusetts, the state Department of Public Health announced Tuesday.

articles.author: Leah Groth
articles.title: New Side Effect of COVID Discovered, Say Doctors | Eat This Not That - Eat This, Not That
articles.description: COVID-19 can do ocular damage in critically ill patients. Researchers used brain MRIs to identify “significant abnormalities” in the eyes.
